headline.main: UK Union Head Calls on Government to Protect Future Vauxhall Jobs
headline.print_headline: UK Union Head Calls on Government to Protect Future Vauxhall Jobs

lead_paragraph: The head of Britain's biggest union called on the government to do all it can to protect jobs at Vauxhall's British car and van plants as new owner Peugeot decides where to build future models.
snippet: The head of Britain's biggest union called on the government to do all it can to protect jobs at Vauxhall's British car and van plants as new owner Peugeot decides where to build future models....
